class_features.name: Boosted Healing
class_features.description: When using your Basic Healing ability, the creature regains a number of hit points equal to 2d8 + your Tec ability.

class_features.name: Touch of Respite
class_features.description: As an action you are able to touch a willing creature and either cure them of one disease, or give them five temporary hit points. The temporary hit points last for 1 hour, or until they are depleted. You may use this ability a number of times equal to your Tec modifier. You regain all expended uses at the end of a Long Rest.

class_features.name: Cybernetics Specialists
class_features.description: Whenever you restore hit points to a creature that has tier 1 or above cybernetic implants they regain additional hit points equal to the number of those implants.

class_features.name: Multiprocess Cybernetic Treatment
class_features.description: As an action choose up to six creatures in a 30ft radius. Each target regains hit points equal to 3d8 + your Tec ability modifier. You may use this feature once per long rest.
